Reviews.Title: “Just what was needed after a long flight”

Reviews.Content: arriving tired dishevelled flight uk quickly warm humoured arrival hampton inn excellent booked king suite queen beds adjoining separate bed linen quality included breakfast reception arranged free shuttle local restaurant airport car hire strongly recommended touching nice start visit haul

Reviews.Content: stay staff helpful friendly hot breakfast included suite comfortable family king bed bedroom queens living hotel quiet clean close airport morning flight day nit pool closed cleaning told ahead time arrangements pool hotel street week travling arizona exhausted hung hotel pizza delivery dinner overall stay clean comfortable close airport

Reviews.Title: “Staff was nice. Hotel was "OK" Would stay again but not as good as other Hampton Inns”
